title: 怎么禁止使用彩色字体
author: 轩玖酱
txt_content:
本人用的是luckprem和ess作为权限组和基础插件
输入了一下指令 却还是可以使用彩色字体
lp group default permission unset  essentials.chat.color
lp group default permission unset  MiaoChat.color
lp group default permission unset  essentials.message.color

求助一下

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content: 试一试lp group default permission set essentials.chat.color false?

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
给负权限呢

lp group default permission set -essentials.chat.color
lp group default permission set -MiaoChat.color
lp group default permission set -essentials.message.color

replies.author: a13695846790
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 a13695846790 于 2020-4-19 12:59 编辑 

这个不是un是另外一个lp group default permission set -essentials.chat.color
lp group default permission set -MiaoChat.color
lp group default permission set -essentials.message.color

replies.author: TheIzumiSagirl
replies.txt_content: 去权限组配置文件那里删
